content:
March 25, 1946 – October 6, 2019

It is with great sadness that we announce the passing of Judith (Judy) Rose Newell (nee Arthur) on Sunday October 6th, 2019 in Smithers BC after a long battle with Alzheimer’s. Judy was born on March 25th, 1946 in Toronto Ontario. Judy grew up in Keswick Ontario and married her husband Rob in August 1966. She lived a life full of adventure, laughter and love. She will always be remembered for her love of children, family and home improvement shows.

Judy is survived by her husband Robert, her brother Victor, sisters Lynn and Tracy, son Christopher, daughter Andrea and their spouses, Laura and Duncan. Along with grandsons Elijah and Bodhi and granddaughters Melody and Heather. A celebration of life will be announced in the Spring.

A special thanks to Dr. Morkel, the amazing staff at the Bulkley Lodge and the community of Houston/Buckflats Road for all your support.
title: Judith Rose “Judy” Newell (nee Arthur) – Houston Today
